TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit PersonalizationStateInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，实现页的一组 Web 部件数据的有关信息的表示形式。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, implements a representation of information about a set of Web Parts data for a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的类表示有关页的共享的状态数据的一组或一系列页面和用户的每用户个性化设置状态数据的信息。Classes that derive from represent information about either a set of shared state data for a page or a set of per-user personalization state data for the page and a user. 此类旨在用于在查询和管理方法中不需要序列化的 Web 部件数据。This class is intended for use in queries and management methods where the serialized Web Parts data is not necessary.

para.span: 继承自，没有抽象成员，必须重写。

span.span: When you inherit from , there are no abstract members that you must override.

para.span: 请注意，此类为抽象，但没有抽象的类成员。

span.span: Note that the class is abstract but none of the class members are abstract.

para.span: 此类当前由.NET Framework 在内部使用，此类的构造函数是内部，因此此类的派生的版本没有任何办法来初始化，和所需的构造函数参数.

span.span: This class is currently used internally by the .NET Framework and the constructor for this class is internal, so derived versions of this class have no way to initialize the , and parameters required for the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LastUpdatedDate As DateTime
public: property DateTime LastUpdatedDate { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 获取上次更新个性化状态的日期和时间。

span.span: Gets the date and time that the personalization state was last updated.

value.span: 一个 ，指示上次更新个性化设置状态的时间。

span.span: A indicating when the personalization state was last updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供的日期和时间的上次更新共享或每用户个性化设置状态信息。This property provides the date and time that the shared or per-user personalization state information was last updated.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Path As String
public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取与个性化设置状态信息关联的页的路径。

span.span: Gets the path to the page associated with the personalization state information.

value.span: 与个性化设置状态信息关联的页的路径。

span.span: The path of the page associated with the personalization state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 路径是相对于应用程序的路径，例如 ~ / application/page/page.aspx。The path is an application-relative path, such as ~/application/page/page.aspx.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Size As Integer
public: property int Size { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取存储在基础数据存储区的个性化设置状态信息的大小。

span.span: Gets the size of the personalization state information stored in the underlying data store.

value.span: 个性化设置状态信息的大小，以字节为单位。

span.span: The size, in bytes, of the personalization state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关共享的状态信息大小表示数据存储区中共享状态的大小。For shared state information, size represents the size of the shared state in the data store. 对于每个用户的信息，大小表示的特定用户和页面组合的每个用户状态大小 (由属性) 存储在数据存储区中。For per-user information, size represents the size of the per-user state for a specific user and page combination (determined by the property) as stored in the data store.
